long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
detektIIIF3 is a Chrome extension that automatically detects IIIF resources (https://iiif.io) in web pages and offers users a convenient way to collect and reuse them. 

detektIIIF3 is considered to be in a public beta state. Find all information on https://detektiiif.net Please feel free to join the open source development of detektIIIF3!
